attributes.action: Make all state funded schools in the UK secular
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you believe that state funded education in the UK should be free from all forms of religious indoctrination, IE the removal of all religious practices including praying, hymn singing, preaching etc. Please sign this petition.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Make all state funded schools in the UK secular."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16857
